page.title: 11A day in the life of Ian
page.content: In the morning at eight o'clock my alrm goes off on my clock radio. I get dressed and go down stairs, I get the milk off the doorstep and put it in the fridge while I have my breakfast of cofee and toast, I watch BBC Breakfast television. While I am washing and cleaning my shoes, my mam makes my sandwichs for my school dinner. Before I leave the house at 8.40 I check that I have my football, library book and trainers in my bag. On my way to school I call for my friend Ian Wallace. Once in school I work until 10.15am at which time the whole school goes into the hall for assembly. After assembly I have a playtime, when I play football, tigy or hounds and hares. At 10.45 I am back in school and work until 12. when it is lunch time. After lunch I go out to play with my friends.
